A: Section A: Objective Questions
1. Professor Wole Soyinka won the Nobel prize for literature in what year (a) 1986 (b) 1990 (c) 1980
2. Wole Soyinka was born into which ethnic group (a) Igbo (b) Yoruba (c) Hausa
3. Wole Soyinka was born in (a) Lagos (b) Ibadan (c) Abeokuta
4. Wole Soyinka was born on July 13, (a) 1934 (b) 1944 (c) 1954
5. Chief Anthony Enahoro was born on July 22, (a) 1913 (b) 1923 (c) 1933
6. Chief Anthony Enahoro was a leading (a) anti-colonial (b) pro-government (c) military activist
7. Nigeria gained independence in the year (a) 1950 (b) 1960 (c) 1970
8. Alhaja Kudirat Abiola was the wife of late Chief (a) Obafemi Awolowo (b) Nnamdi Azikiwe (c) MKO Abiola
9. Chief MKO Abiola won the presidential election held on (a) June 12, 1993 (b) May 29, 1999 (c) October 1, 1960
10. Alhaja Kudirat Abiola was killed in what year (a) 1993 (b) 1996 (c) 1999
11. A traditional ruler is a _ leader who protects traditions (a) political (b) cultural (c) religious
12. The title 'Emir' is used in (a) Hausa land (b) Yoruba land (c) Igbo land
13. The title 'Oba' is used in (a) Hausa land (b) Yoruba land (c) Igbo land
14. The title 'Eze' is used in (a) Hausa land (b) Yoruba land (c) Igbo land
15. Traditional rulers are the head of an _ unit or clan (a) military (b) economic (c) ethnic
16. One role of traditional rulers is to settle _ quarrels (a) land and marriage (b) business (c) political
17. Traditional rulers educate people to do their _ duties (a) personal (b) civic (c) family
18. Traditional rulers make people to obey _ and order (a) rules (b) laws (c) customs
19. Wole Soyinka is regarded as one of the best poets, play writs and _ writer (a) novel (b) essay (c) song
20. Chief Anthony Enahoro had a long experience in publishing, politics and _ movements (a) pro-democracy (b) anti-democracy (c) military
B: 1. What year did Professor Wole Soyinka win the Nobel prize for literature? _________
2. What is the full name of the first African Nobel prize winner for literature mentioned? _________
3. Who was the first Nigerian to move the motion for Nigeria's independence? _________
4. Who was Alhaja Kudirat Abiola's husband? _________
5. What is one title for a traditional ruler in Yoruba land? _________
C: 1. List two roles of traditional rulers in the community.
2. Name two traditional ruler titles found in Hausa land.
3. What was one major fight that Alhaja Kudirat Abiola engaged in?
4. Mention one achievement of Professor Wole Soyinka.
5. What significant motion did Chief Anthony Enahoro move?
answers_C: Custodian of culture, Settle land and marriage quarrels
First African Nobel prize for literature winner
